name: Stuhac
description: The Stuhac is a medium-sized fiend with a natural armor that allows it to effectively protect itself in combat. It has impressive physical attributes, particularly strength and constitution, showcasing its capabilities as a tough opponent.
memorable: The Stuhac can disguise itself and manipulate opponents telekinetically, making it a strategic threat.
goals: It seeks to deceive, manipulate, and outmaneuver its foes in battle.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other fiends or as a subordinate to more powerful fiendish beings.
environment: Rocky terrains or areas where it can blend in with surroundings.
strengths: Strong combat abilities with high damage output and several immunities to cold and poison.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks that deal nonmagical bludgeoning or piercing damage.
attacks: Multiattack includes a bite attack dealing piercing damage and two claw attacks dealing slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Hobble action allows it to inflict force damage and impair target movement effectively.
skills: Skilled in deception, making it adept in manipulation and trickery.
additional_information: Immunities to cold, poison, and the poisoned condition.
Can move easily across rocky surfaces due to Mountain Walk ability.
Standing Leap ability enhances its mobility in a variety of terrains.
Has strong saving throw proficiencies across multiple attributes.
Can communicate telepathically within a range of 120 feet.
test_queries: medium fiend with strong deception skills
combat monster that manipulates its foes
stealthy fiend that moves easily over rocks
fiend with telekinetic abilities and deadly attacks
strong monster with resistances and immunities
